attributes.action: Ban pet farms completely as buisness/home.
attributes.additional_details: Stop people being to profit and sale animals so freely in newspapers etc.There are strict rules selling cattle so why can someone secretly sell cats and dogs etc kept in bad conditions and taken from parients too early,just for money.Its cruel and selfish.Animals have more rights than humans as they were first,yet we treat them badly herr and abroad e.g bull fighting.Why are illegals and visitors allowed to remain after committing crime,shows no RESPECT for uk.Thousands of bogus companies run earning millions,scamming,loopholes and no one held accountable for anything anymore.Wherrs 'great' britain? The gov has this ifea its doing great..why?
